headline.main: 2 GOP Senators Would Let States Keep Obama Health Law
headline.print_headline: 2 GOP Senators Would Let States Keep Obama Health Law

docs.lead_paragraph: Two Republican senators said Monday that they'll propose legislation that lets states keep former President Barack Obama's health care overhaul or opt for a new program providing trimmed-down coverage.

headline.main: Trump Undoes Parts of Obama Agenda With Executive Actions
headline.print_headline: Trump Undoes Parts of Obama Agenda With Executive Actions

docs.lead_paragraph: President Donald Trump signed three executive memorandums on Monday, kicking off his first full week in the White House by undoing parts of his predecessor's agenda and renewing a longtime Republican priority on abortion funding.

headline.sub: Flexes Political Muscle in a Move to End Criticism as Well;
headline.main: Obama Presses for Quick Jolt to the Economy

byline.original: By JACKIE CALMES and DAVID M. HERSZENHORN
byline.contributor: Peter Baker, Michael Falcone and Sheryl Gay Stolberg contributed reporting.

docs.lead_paragraph: President Obama stepped into the effort to assemble an economic recovery package, seeking to quell criticism and to retain leadership on an initiative that could define his term.
